text.title: 'Terror' shooting wounds three on international train in Belgium
text.head: 'Terror' shooting wounds three on international train in Belgium
Sources

list.item: "2 Marines subdue gunman who wounded 3 on high-speed train to Paris" — Chicago Tribune , August 21, 2015
Barney Henderson, Andrew Marszal, James Rothwell. "Gunman injures three after firing Kalashnikov on Amsterdam-Paris train: latest" — The Daily Telegraph , August 22, 2015
Angelique Chrisafis. "Gunman opens fire on Amsterdam-Paris train, wounding two people" — The Guardian , August 21, 2015
"France train shooting: Americans overpower gunman" — BBC News Online , August 21, 2015
